text: My house is in the 12 of Wall Street, New York. I traveled a lot of countries. Last year, I went
to Egypt and say the Pyramids. I attended a festival in August. My birthday was the 31 May. I had a teacher
whose name is Mr. HartzMann. I used to admire people with great success stories like the fatest man alive Usian Boltz
When I was young I used to wonder why is the sky so dark at night and why is milk white. I also used to love mathematics
wondering what is the biggest number and. I like colors espacially the color Blue. I like making new friends so I used
to go out and ask people to party. I liked going with my friend Goerge. I also like playing competitive games like football.
Our team captain was Jeff. I was number 12 in my team. After finishing our last football game in High School, Thomas forgot his umbrella and Philippe
forgot his phone in the playing field. In high school, I also used to do the 12 meters sprint. I used to eat up to 11 chocolate bars per week.
I takes me 10 minutes to do my homeworks. However, I also used to love my 15 video games and play 2 hours per week. My brother is
14 years old. Now I am 22 years old, I drink a 2 cups of coffee per day. I travel 12 kilometers to go to work.
It takes about 12 minutes to go to work. Barack Obama is a humble person. Even when governing he most powerful nation on earth you can still see him wearing a tee-shirt

who: Who is the fatest man alive ?
why: Why the sky is dark at night ?
whom: Whom are you going to ask to the party?
Whom did they choose as team captain?
what: What is my number in the football team?
how_far: How far have I gone sprinting?
How far do I travel to work?
how_long: How long does it take to do home works?
How long does it take to go to work ?
how_many: How many chocolate bars do I like to have ?
How many video games do I have ?
how_much: How much coffee did I like to have ?
How much time I spent playing video games ?
how_old: How old is my little brother ?
